title: Specifications
clause_text: Specifications. - General specifications of the proposed construction, giving the type and grade of materials to be used in the form in Annexure 2 to 9 signed by a licensed surveyor/engineer/structural engineer, supervisor, architect, town planner or qualified professional as the case may be, shall accompany the notice. It shall be ensured that the construction materials to be used shall be in accordance with the relevant I S Codes, by the developer/owner.
section: Contour plan of site, wherever necessary .

source_pdf.text_snippet: Specifications. - General specifications of the proposed construction, giving the type and grade of materials to be used in the form in Annexure 2 to 9 signed by a licensed surveyor/engineer/structura
